WorkItem.Description:
Trying to create a universal Windows 8/WP8 app, but I can't add Naudio package to WP8.1 project.
Is WP8 unsupported? Will it be supported anytime soon?
WorkItem.Summary: Not available for Windows Phone 8 projects?

Comments.Message: I'd love to add WP8.1 support, but time is limited at the moment. Hopefully it will be easier now that we've added WinStore support as I understand that the WP8.1 API is getting  much closer to the Windows Store one.
